sen.j: 實川 額十郎（じつかわ がくじゅうろう）は、歌舞伎役者。
sen.e: Gakujuro JITSUKAWA was a Kabuki performer.
Gakujuro JITSUKAWA was a Kabuki performer.
Gakujuro JITSUKAWA was a Kabuki performer.
His stage family name (Kabuki) was Izutsuya.
His stage family name (Kabuki) was Izutsuya.
His stage family name (Kabuki) was Izutsuya.
Gakujuro JITSUKAWA (the first)

sen.j: 浅尾工左衛門 (初代)の門下。
sen.e: He was a disciple of (the first) Kuzaemon ASAO.
sen.cmt: 「浅尾工左衛門」の読み方が確認できていません。また、セルの最初に―が入っていると、その後の作業ができなかったため、消去しました。
sen.e: He was a disciple of (the first) Kuzaemon ASAO.
He was a disciple of (the first) Kuzaemon ASAO.
Gakujuro JITSUKAWA (the second)

He was adopted to the first Gakujuro JITSUKAWA.

sen.j: 俗に「盲の額十郎」という。
sen.e: He was comonly called 'Gakujuro the Blind.'
He was commonly called 'Gakujuro the Blind.'
He was commonly called 'Gakujuro the Blind.'
